EmailTemplate.name: Trade In Info Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: Trade In Information Needed to Move Deal Forward
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is to notify you that the deal for {!Opportunity.Name} is trying to move forward without the necessary trade in information required. In order to build this boat.
We require:
- the signed ownerships from the customer AND - a full appraisal on the physical boat.
Please ensure that these are both complete and checked off in the Opportunity before this customer's new boat package is built.
Thank you!
